modules.description: Provides functions to read from and write to network flows, with explicit handling of errors and shutdown states. Operates on `flow` objects and custom error types, including `error` and `write_error`. Used to manage data transmission in network protocols, ensuring proper cleanup and error recovery after I/O operations.

Provides functions to read from and write to a flow, with explicit handling of errors and shutdown states. Operates on `flow` objects, `Cstruct.t` buffers, and custom error types for read and write operations. Used to manage network communication, ensuring proper resource cleanup and error recovery during data transmission.

Handles WebSocket protocol negotiation and communication, including parsing upgrade headers and managing message framing. Operates on byte streams, strings, and binary data through dedicated encoding and decoding functions. Used to establish real-time communication channels in networked applications requiring low-latency data exchange.

Handles WebSocket connections by defining input handlers for messages and control frames, using a socket and configuration to establish a server-side connection. Operates on `socket` types and `Httpun_ws.Wsd.t` to manage real-time communication. Used to implement custom WebSocket protocols in MirageOS-based network applications.
